titles.title: A resolution to commemorate the dedication of the Russian Bishops House in Sitka, Alaska on Alaska Day, October 18, 1988.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/17/1988--Introduced. Declares that the Senate sends its congratulations to the National Park Service and the people of Sitka, Alaska, on the dedication of the Russian Bishops House on Alaska Day. Designates October 18, 1988, as Russian-American Heritage Day.
